title: May it be your body that ends up raising hollyhocks, not your Digital Heritage
paragraph: Ensure that your digital wealth ends up in the hands of the people you love most with Leggado.Digital. Securely register, order and plan all your assets online in one place, so they don't end up buried with you and live in the pocket of your family.
paragraph2: Anti-Superstition Proof. We guarantee that death will not knock on your door after your discharge. And if it does, peace be with you
